title: David Bowie: Moonage Daydream
description: David Bowie's career has been one of the most colourful and intriguing in modern rock history. In Moonage Daydream Dave Thompson not only looks into the man himself, as seen through the eyes of many of the people who surrounded him and helped to influence him, but also carefully chronicles every step of Bowie's career detailing every concert performance, all original compositions, and a complete discography. A must for every dedicated Bowie fan.
author: Dave Thompson
